title: Classic Starter Acoustic Guitar
description: A fantastic full-sized acoustic guitar perfect for beginners. Features a spruce top and mahogany back and sides for a warm resonant tone. Easy to play with a comfortable neck profile. Durable construction ensures longevity making it an excellent first instrument for aspiring musicians of all ages. Includes a gig bag and an introductory lesson book.

title: Vintage-Style Solid Body Electric Guitar
description: A sleek vintage-inspired electric guitar with a classic double-cutaway design and three single-coil pickups for that unmistakable bright twangy tone. Ideal for genres like rock blues and country. The alder body and maple neck provide excellent sustain and clarity. Comes equipped with a tremolo bridge for expressive pitch bending and a five-way selector switch for tonal versatility.

title: Premium Hollow Body Jazz Guitar
description: An exquisite hollow body guitar designed for jazz blues and RB musicians. Its archtop design and dual humbucker pickups deliver a warm rich and mellow sound with superb articulation and sustain. The maple body and neck combined with a rosewood fretboard offer a luxurious feel and elegant look. A true professional instrument perfect for sophisticated chord voicings and smooth lead lines.

title: Yamaha P-45 Digital Piano
description: An excellent entry-level digital piano featuring 88 Graded Hammer Standard (GHS) keys, offering a realistic acoustic piano feel. It includes 10 quality voices and a compact, lightweight design, perfect for home practice or small studio spaces. Simple operation makes it a favorite for beginners and students.
details: Includes sustain pedal and power adapter

title: Korg B2N Digital Piano
description: A light-touch digital piano designed for easy playability. It features 88 Natural Touch Keyboard (NT) keys which require less force, reducing fatigue for newer players. Packed with 12 diverse sounds and ample connectivity, this instrument provides a superb playing experience for its class and is highly portable.
details: Includes software bundle (Skoove, Korg Module, etc.)

title: Casio Privia PX-770 Console Digital Piano
description: A furniture-style digital piano with a Tri-sensor Scaled Hammer Action Keyboard II. It recreates the touch and tone of a grand piano, including a powerful speaker system built into the console stand. Perfect for players who want a permanent, elegant fixture that offers a great musical experience.
details: 88 Tri-sensor Scaled Hammer Action Keyboard II
Concert Play feature (10 live audio recordings)

title: Roland FP-30X Digital Piano
description: A popular choice for its balance of features and portability. The SuperNATURAL Piano sound engine delivers rich, expressive tone, complemented by the 88-note PHA-4 Standard keyboard for authentic acoustic-style touch. Bluetooth audio and MIDI connectivity make it excellent for modern learning and performance.
details: Optional KSC-70 stand and KPD-70 three-pedal unit

title: Nord Stage 3 88-Key Performance Keyboard
description: The professional's choice, this performance keyboard combines the latest award-winning technologies in Piano, Organ, and Synthesizer sound generation. It features a fully weighted hammer action keybed, a massive sound library, and an intuitive panel layout, making it a powerful tool for touring musicians and studio producers.
details: Nord Lead A1 Synth Engine with sample playback
Massive 2 GB library for Nord Piano Library

title: Alesis Recital Pro Digital Piano
description: A full-featured digital piano for students and intermediate players. It includes 88 full-sized, hammer-action keys with adjustable touch response, 12 built-in premium voices, and 20-watt built-in speakers. It's an affordable option that doesn't compromise on a realistic playing experience and is loaded with practice features.

title: Yamaha Clavinova CLP-735 Digital Piano
description: A premium upright digital piano offering the superb touch of the GrandTouch-S keyboard with synthetic ebony and ivory keytops. It features the sounds of the renowned Yamaha CFX and Bösendorfer Imperial concert grand pianos, captured with state-of-the-art binaural sampling technology for an immersive headphone experience.
details: GrandTouch-S keyboard with Synthetic Ebony and Ivory keytops
Yamaha CFX and Bösendorfer Imperial samples
Binaural Sampling for a fully immersive soundscape
Grand Expression Modeling for enhanced nuance
Three pedals (Damper with half-pedal effect, Sostenuto, Soft)

title: Kawai ES110 Portable Digital Piano
description: Kawai's entry-level portable piano, known for its excellent keyboard action and authentic sound. It uses the Harmonic Imaging sound technology and features the Responsive Hammer Compact (RHC) action for a realistic feel. This model is lightweight, making it an ideal choice for gigging and taking to lessons.

title: Arturia KeyLab Essential 61 MIDI Controller
description: A powerful 61-key MIDI controller with a synth-action keybed, designed for producers and musicians. It offers tight integration with Arturia's Analog Lab software (included) and features 8 pads, 9 rotary encoders, and 9 faders for hands-on control of your digital audio workstation (DAW) and virtual instruments.
details: DAW control commands for major software

title: Yamaha PSR-EW300 Portable Keyboard
description: A versatile 76-key portable keyboard ideal for learning and casual playing. It features touch-sensitive keys for expressive dynamics, 574 high-quality voices, 165 accompaniment styles, and a comprehensive lesson function called 'Yamaha Education Suite' (Y.E.S.). Great for exploring various musical genres.
details: USB to Host for MIDI and audio transfer
Duo mode for practice with a partner

title: Roland JUNO-DS61 Synthesizer
description: A performance-ready synthesizer with over 1,200 pro-quality sounds, including pianos, organs, and synth patches. The 61-note velocity-sensitive keyboard is lightweight, and its battery-powered option makes it highly portable for gigging musicians. Features an 8-track pattern sequencer and mic input with dedicated vocal effects.
details: Mic input with Vocoder and Auto Pitch

title: Studiologic Numa Compact 2x
description: A highly versatile 88-key stage piano featuring semi-weighted Fatar TP/9 PIANO keys. It includes three sound engines: a Tone Wheel Organ section, a professional Physical Modeling engine for electric pianos, and a comprehensive sample-based sound engine for acoustic sounds. Great lightweight all-in-one gigging solution.

title: Casio WK-7600 Workstation Keyboard
description: A high-power workstation keyboard with 76 piano-style, touch-response keys. It's packed with 820 tones, 260 rhythms, and a 17-track sequencer for creating full arrangements. Ideal for composers and hobbyists who need a wide range of features, including a drawbar organ function, at an accessible price point.

title: Moog Subsequent 37 Analog Synthesizer
description: A highly acclaimed 37-key paraphonic analog synthesizer known for its powerful sound engine and legendary Moog ladder filter. It's an expressive keyboard featuring a fast-acting keybed with aftertouch, two powerful oscillators, and extensive patching capabilities. A staple for professional sound design and analog enthusiasts.
details: Massive sonic capability for bass and leads

title: Yamaha MODX8 Synthesizer Workstation
description: A streamlined, powerful 88-key Weighted Graded Hammer Action workstation combining the two legendary synthesis engines from the flagship Montage: AWM2 (Advanced Wave Memory 2) and FM-X (Frequency Modulation). It offers deep programming, incredible sound quality, and VCM effects, all in a lightweight package for performers.
details: Super Knob for simultaneous control of multiple parameters

title: Alesis Nitro Max Electronic Drum Kit
description: A top-rated electronic drum set for beginners and practice in quiet environments. It features responsive, quiet mesh drum heads on all pads (snare and toms), a dedicated kick drum pad tower, and a powerful sound module with 440 professionally sampled sounds. Integrated Bluetooth allows you to stream music for play-along sessions, making it an excellent all-in-one learning tool.
details: 440 BFD drum, cymbal, and percussion sounds
60 built-in play-along tracks and a sequencer
Includes drum module, rack, sticks, and cables

title: Pearl Roadshow 5-Piece Acoustic Drum Set
description: An excellent entry-level acoustic drum kit from a world-renowned brand. This 5-piece set is ready to play right out of the box, including drum shells, a full set of hardware (stands, pedal, throne), and a basic cymbal pack. Its poplar shells deliver a robust sound, making it perfect for students and new drummers learning rock, jazz, or pop styles.
details: 5-piece shell pack (Bass, Snare, 2 Toms, Floor Tom)
Includes hardware, cymbals, throne, and sticks
Excellent value for an all-inclusive beginner kit

title: Roland TD-17KV2 V-Drums Electronic Kit
description: A high-quality electronic drum kit that balances performance and affordability, ideal for intermediate and advanced practice. Featuring the updated TD-17 module with new kits and enhanced features, it uses mesh heads for a realistic stick response and an excellent feel. The kit is highly customizable and perfect for home recording and serious skill development.
details: Dual-ply mesh snare and tom pads
Authentic V-Cymbal pads for crash and ride
USB and MIDI outputs for studio integration

title: Zildjian I Family Standard Cymbal Set
description: A brilliant-finish cymbal pack designed for the developing drummer. The I Family provides clear, bright, and expressive tones, making them a significant upgrade from entry-level cymbals. This standard set includes a pair of hi-hats, a crash cymbal, and a ride cymbal, offering a complete foundation for any drum kit in a wide range of musical styles.
details: Thin weight for fast response and decay
Brilliant finish for dazzling visual appeal

title: Ludwig Breakbeats by Questlove Shell Pack
description: A compact, four-piece acoustic drum shell pack designed in collaboration with Questlove. Its small footprint is perfect for small venues, home practice, or city apartment living, yet it delivers a surprising amount of punch and volume for its size. The low-mass lugs and bass drum riser ensure a professional sound despite the miniature design. Cymbals and hardware sold separately.
details: Includes a velveteen gig bag for storage/transport
Bass drum riser for optimal kick pedal placement
Perfect for small spaces and portability
Punchy, dry tone suitable for urban styles

title: Latin Percussion Aspire Accents Cajon
description: A versatile and portable percussion instrument that serves as a complete drum kit in a box. Made from birch wood with a striking frontplate, it delivers deep bass notes from the center and crisp, snapping snare sounds from the top corners. Ideal for acoustic sets, rehearsals, or as a practice tool, it's popular across folk, unplugged, and world music genres.
details: Produces a deep bass and crisp snare sound
Rubber feet for stability and protection

title: DW 5000 Series Single Bass Drum Pedal
description: The industry standard for professional bass drum pedals, known for its speed, smooth action, and incredible durability. The Delta hinge and dual-bearing spring rocker assembly ensure fast, consistent performance, making it a favorite among gigging drummers for its reliability and precision. A true workhorse pedal built to withstand years of heavy use.
details: Chain-drive system for power and speed
Tri-Pivot Toe Clamp for secure mounting
Non-skid rubber grip and velcro base plate

title: Remo Festival Djembe Drum (Key-Tuned)
description: A modern take on the traditional West African goblet drum, this djembe features a durable, weather-resistant Acousticon shell and a Fiberskyn synthetic drumhead. The key-tuning system allows for easy and precise tuning, a significant advantage over traditional rope-tuned models. It produces a wide range of tones, from deep bass to sharp slaps, perfect for drum circles and world music.
details: Key-tuned system for easy, stable tuning

title: Tama Imperialstar 5-Piece Drum Set
description: A full-sized, ready-to-play acoustic drum kit that has set the standard for intermediate-level quality. The shells are made from poplar, which produces a full, warm tone with medium attack. This set includes quality hardware, cymbals, and a drum throne, making it a solid, reliable choice for serious beginners looking to step up their gear.
details: Includes a full set of durable Tama hardware
Accu-Tune Bass Drum Hoops for stable tuning
Ideal for rock, metal, and heavy genres

title: Roland SPD-SX Sampling Pad
description: The industry-standard sampling pad for professional drummers and percussionists. This performance tool offers nine dynamic pads for triggering one-shot samples, loops, and backing tracks. With 4GB of internal memory and versatile connectivity, it's essential for hybrid acoustic/electronic setups, live performance, and studio work, allowing you to add unlimited sonic textures to your music.
details: Master and individual outputs for flexible mixing
Essential for hybrid drumming and sound expansion

title: Focusrite Scarlett 2i2 (4th Gen) Audio Interface
description: The world's best-selling 2-in/2-out USB audio interface, now in its fourth generation. Features high-performance preamps, 192kHz/24-bit converters, and a powerful 'Air' mode for brighter, more open sound. Perfect for musicians and podcasters.
details: 2 x Scarlett mic preamps with 69dB of gain
Switchable Air mode for vocal and instrument enhancement

title: Rode NT1 (5th Gen) Condenser Microphone
description: A legendary large-diaphragm condenser microphone known for its incredibly low self-noise and warm, detailed sound. This 5th gen model offers both traditional XLR and an innovative USB-C output with a built-in A/D converter, making it versatile for any studio setup.
details: Includes studio-grade shock mount and pop filter

title: Shure SM7B Dynamic Vocal Microphone
description: The industry standard dynamic microphone for broadcast, podcasting, and rock vocals. Delivers a smooth, flat, wide-range frequency response for clean, natural reproduction of music and speech. Excellent shielding against electromagnetic hum.
details: Dynamic cartridge with flat, wide-range frequency response
Cardioid polar pattern for excellent off-axis rejection
Air suspension shock isolation to eliminate mechanical noise
Bass roll-off and mid-range emphasis controls (Presence Boost)
Ideal for close-miked vocals and demanding acoustics

title: Yamaha HS5 Active Studio Monitor (Pair)
description: A classic pair of nearfield monitors, known for their honest, uncolored sound that allows for accurate mixing. The 5-inch cone woofer and 1-inch dome tweeter deliver a clear, high-resolution sound, making them a staple in home and professional studios alike.
details: Bi-amplified: 45W LF + 25W HF for 70W total power
Room Control and High Trim response controls
XLR and TRS phone jack inputs
Clear and honest frequency response for critical listening

title: Beyerdynamic DT 770 PRO Studio Headphones
description: Closed-back studio headphones, essential for tracking vocals and instruments due to their excellent sound isolation. Known for their deep bass, analytical mid-range, and long-lasting comfort, ideal for extended recording sessions. Available in various impedance options.
details: Soft velour earpads for maximum comfort
Ideal for tracking, monitoring, and reference listening

title: Novation Launchkey 49 MIDI Controller
description: A powerful and intuitive 49-key keyboard controller designed for deep integration with Ableton Live and other major DAWs. Features velocity-sensitive keys, 16 pads, 9 faders, and various control knobs for hands-on production and performance.
details: Full DAW control for recording, mixing, and transport

title: Acoustic Foam Panel Kit (12 Pack)
description: Essential wedge-style acoustic treatment for reducing standing waves and flutter echo in home recording environments. Improves clarity and overall sound accuracy, making your recordings and mixes more professional. Easy to install on walls and ceilings.
details: Reduces flutter echo and standing waves
Improves vocal clarity and acoustic accuracy

title: Universal Audio Apollo Twin X DUO
description: A professional Thunderbolt 3 audio interface with world-class A/D and D/A conversion. Features DUO Core processing for running UAD plugins in real-time with near-zero latency, perfect for pro-level tracking and mixing with classic analog emulation plugins.
details: 2 x Unison preamps for authentic tube/transformer emulation
Includes Realtime Analog Classics UAD Plug-In Bundle

title: KRK ROKIT RP5 G4 Studio Monitor (Pair)
description: A pair of 5-inch professional bi-amped studio monitors favored by producers worldwide. Features a brick-wall limiter, Kevlar® aramid fiber drivers, and a graphic EQ with 25 settings to help tune the monitors to your specific room environment.
details: 5-inch Kevlar® Aramid Fiber woofer and tweeter
Built-in DSP-driven Graphic EQ with 25 settings
KRK Audio Tools App for room analysis and setup

title: Behringer X32 Digital Mixer
description: A popular 40-input, 25-bus digital mixing console for live, studio, and installation applications. Features 32 Midas-designed preamps and motorized faders.

title: QSC K12.2 Active Loudspeaker
description: A high-performance, active 12-inch powered loudspeaker delivering 2000W of peak power. Excellent clarity for main PA or stage monitor use.
details: Presets for common applications (Live, Dance, Monitor)
Rugged ABS enclosure for road use

title: Shure SM58 Dynamic Vocal Microphone
description: The industry-standard, rugged dynamic vocal microphone. Famous for its tailored frequency response for vocals and reliable, professional sound on stage.
details: Pneumatic shock-mount system reduces handling noise
Highly effective spherical filter minimizes breath noise
Cardioid pickup pattern for feedback rejection

title: Shure QLXD24/SM58 Digital Wireless System
description: Professional digital wireless system featuring the SM58 capsule. Delivers 24-bit clear audio, easy setup, and secure transmission for demanding live events.
details: SM58 Handheld Transmitter with QLXD4 Receiver
Automatic frequency scanning and IR sync

title: Electro-Voice ZLX-12P Active Monitor
description: A compact and versatile 12-inch powered loudspeaker, often used as a stage monitor or small FOH speaker. Known for its clarity and lightweight design.
details: LCD display and single-knob DSP control
Angled design for use as a floor monitor
Patented Split-Baffle design for superior driver time alignment

title: Electro-Voice EVOLVE 30M Column PA
description: A portable column loudspeaker system with a built-in 8-channel digital mixer. Ideal for solo musicians, small bands, and mobile DJs needing quick setup.
details: Column system with 10-inch subwoofer and 6 array drivers
Bluetooth audio streaming and control via QuickSmart Mobile app
Four factory presets (Music, Live, Speech, Club)

title: JBL PRX918XLF Powered Subwoofer
description: A high-output 18-inch powered subwoofer designed to extend the low-frequency response of any live sound system for music and events.
details: Integrated JBL DSP for tuning and control
Durable birch/poplar cabinet with DuraFlex™ finish

title: Shure PSM300 Stereo In-Ear Monitor System
description: A reliable in-ear monitoring system for performers, offering 24-bit digital audio and up to 90dB of dynamic range for clear stage sound.
details: Includes P3T Transmitter and P3R Bodypack Receiver

title: Radial Engineering ProDI Passive Direct Box
description: A rugged, passive direct injection box essential for connecting unbalanced instruments (like guitars/keyboards) directly to a balanced mixer input.

title: Hosa Stage Box Snake 24x8 (100 ft)
description: A 100-foot multi-channel cable (snake) and stage box, providing 24 XLR inputs and 8 XLR returns for running all stage signals to a front-of-house mixer.
details: 24 XLR Inputs and 8 XLR Returns (32 channels total)

title: dbx 231s Dual 31-Band Graphic Equalizer
description: A professional dual 31-band graphic equalizer for fine-tuning the PA system's frequency response and eliminating feedback in live venues.
details: Switchable boost/cut ranges of $\pm 6\text{ dB}$ or $\pm 12\text{ dB}$

title: Pioneer DJ DDJ-FLX10 4-Channel DJ Controller
description: A flagship 4-channel performance DJ controller compatible with rekordbox and Serato DJ Pro. Features a club-style layout, on-jog displays, DMX output for lighting control, and hands-on track separation features (Stems/Part Isolation). Perfect for professional-level mixing and creative performance.
details: Compatible with rekordbox and Serato DJ Pro
On-Jog Display for track information and artwork
DMX output for easy lighting control with rekordbox

title: Technics SL-1200MK7 Direct Drive Turntable
description: The modern iteration of the legendary standard DJ turntable, known for its high-torque direct drive, unwavering pitch stability, and robust build. The professional choice for vinyl DJs and turntablists, providing the iconic feel and precision required for scratching and mixing.
details: High-torque direct-drive motor for stable rotation

title: Pioneer DJM-A9 4-Channel Professional DJ Mixer
description: The current club-standard 4-channel professional DJ mixer, succeeding the DJM-900NXS2. Features crystal-clear sound quality, enhanced effects, two USB-B and two USB-C ports for seamless DJ changeovers, and improved Mic section for MCs. Essential for top-tier venues and artists.
details: Upgraded Beat FX and new Center Lock feature
Two USB-B and two USB-C ports for laptop connection
Enhanced Microphone section with Phantom Power
PRO DJ LINK with gigabit Ethernet

title: AlphaTheta XDJ-AZ All-in-One DJ System
description: A 4-deck standalone all-in-one DJ system that brings the club-standard feel without needing a laptop. Features a large touchscreen, built-in Wi-Fi for cloud music library access, and professional effects. Offers unmatched flexibility for mobile and club DJs alike.
details: Built-in Wi-Fi for access to cloud libraries
Layout based on CDJ-3000 and DJM-900NXS2
Two Mic inputs with independent EQ/FX
Compatible with rekordbox and Serato DJ Pro

title: Allen & Heath Xone:96 Analog DJ Mixer
description: A premium analog 6+2 channel DJ mixer with dual 32-bit USB soundcards for professional club installations. Known for its legendary Xone filter with CRUNCH harmonic distortion, exceptional sound quality, and robust construction. A favorite for house and techno DJs.
details: Legendary Xone VCF filter with CRUNCH distortion

title: Audio-Technica ATH-M50x Professional Headphones
description: Critically acclaimed professional monitor headphones, perfect for both DJ monitoring and studio tracking/mixing. They provide exceptional clarity, deep, accurate bass response, and excellent sound isolation. Their robust, collapsible design makes them a staple for mobile DJs.
details: Exceptional clarity throughout an extended frequency range

title: 20ft Pro-Grade XLR Microphone Cable
description: A high-quality, 20-foot XLR cable essential for connecting microphones, mixers, and audio interfaces. Features durable metal connectors and a thick, shielded jacket for minimal signal noise and maximum longevity on stage or in the studio. Ideal for professional recording and live sound applications, ensuring a clean and reliable audio signal.
details: Connector Type: Male XLR to Female XLR
Jacket Material: Durable PVC for flexibility and protection
Application: Microphones, studio gear, and live sound equipment

title: Universal A-Frame Guitar Stand
description: A lightweight, folding A-Frame stand designed for secure and convenient storage of acoustic, electric, and bass guitars. Constructed from durable, non-slip metal with soft rubber padding on all contact points to protect your instrument's finish. Folds flat for easy transport to gigs, rehearsals, or home storage.
details: Compatibility: Universal for electric, acoustic, and bass guitars
Portability: Folds flat for easy storage and travel

title: Pink Floyd - The Dark Side of the Moon (1973)
description: A landmark progressive rock album exploring themes of conflict, greed, time, and mental illness. Features iconic tracks like 'Money' and 'Time.' Known for its innovative production and seamless transitions, it's a must-have for any serious collector.

title: Fleetwood Mac - Rumours (1977)
description: The quintessential breakup album of the 70s, chronicling the band's internal relationship turmoil with a perfect blend of pop-rock sensibilities. Includes massive hits 'Dreams,' 'Go Your Own Way,' and 'The Chain.' A timeless masterpiece for vinyl listening.

title: The Beatles - Abbey Road (1969)
description: The final recorded album by the band, featuring some of their most sophisticated and well-produced music. Side two is famous for its medley of song fragments. Iconic cover art makes it a staple for any vinyl wall and collection.

title: Michael Jackson - Thriller (1982)
description: The best-selling album of all time, redefining pop music and the music video as an art form. Features 7 hit singles including 'Billie Jean,' 'Beat It,' and the title track. A pop culture phenomenon essential for any music lover.

title: Miles Davis - Kind of Blue (1959)
description: A pioneering work of modal jazz and one of the most acclaimed jazz albums of all time. Features an all-star line-up including John Coltrane and Bill Evans. Its cool, understated mood makes it perfect for a relaxed evening listen.

title: Led Zeppelin - Led Zeppelin IV (1971)
description: Officially untitled, this album features the band's signature blend of hard rock, folk, and mythology. Home to the legendary 'Stairway to Heaven,' 'Black Dog,' and 'Rock and Roll.' A cornerstone of classic rock vinyl collections.

title: Amy Winehouse - Back to Black (2006)
description: A modern soul classic that blends R&B, jazz, and 60s girl group sounds. Winehouse's raw, heartfelt lyrics and powerhouse vocals on tracks like 'Rehab' and 'Valerie' cemented her legacy. A must-own contemporary record on vinyl.

title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Legend (1984)
description: The best-selling reggae album of all time, compiling the greatest hits of the iconic artist. Features beloved tracks like 'No Woman, No Cry,' 'Buffalo Soldier,' and 'Redemption Song.' An essential, warm-sounding vinyl experience.

title: Taylor Swift - The Tortured Poets Department (2024)
description: One of the best-selling vinyl LPs of its release year. This highly-anticipated album features introspective and sharp lyricism paired with synth-pop production. A modern vinyl phenomenon for new and seasoned collectors alike.

title: Oasis - Definitely Maybe (1994)
description: The debut album from the Manchester band, credited with spearheading the Britpop movement. Loaded with anthems like 'Supersonic' and 'Live Forever,' it's a loud, brash, and timeless rock record essential for 90s nostalgia.

title: Marvin Gaye - What's Going On (1971)
description: A socially conscious concept album that departed from the Motown sound, addressing war, poverty, and environmental issues. Its lush orchestration and layered vocals make it an emotional and sonic masterpiece for vinyl.

title: Prince and The Revolution - Purple Rain (1984)
description: The soundtrack to the film of the same name, seamlessly blending rock, R&B, and pop. A definitive 80s album featuring the iconic title track, 'When Doves Cry,' and 'Let's Go Crazy.' A high-energy vinyl experience.

title: Chappell Roan - The Rise and Fall of a Midwest Princess (2023)
description: A breakout pop album known for its theatrical, queer-forward lyrics and catchy hooks, including the hit 'Good Luck, Babe!' One of the top-selling new vinyl releases, capturing the energy of contemporary pop music.

title: The Clash - London Calling (1979)
description: A genre-bending post-punk masterpiece that incorporates punk rock, reggae, rockabilly, and jazz. Its political themes and musical diversity make it a pivotal record in rock history, presented as a 2-LP set.

title: Marantz PM6007 Integrated Stereo Amplifier
description: A celebrated entry-level integrated amplifier known for its detailed, musical sound. Features high-quality current feedback amplification, a built-in DAC, and an excellent moving magnet (MM) phono stage for vinyl lovers. A perfect foundation for a two-channel hi-fi system.

title: NAD C 316BEE V2 Integrated Amplifier
description: An award-winning integrated amplifier that delivers high-performance sound at a budget-friendly price. It offers a clean, dynamic sound signature and includes an excellent, low-noise Moving Magnet (MM) Phono stage, making it ideal for vinyl enthusiasts or those new to hi-fi separates.
details: Analog Inputs: 5 line level inputs (RCA), 1 Phono (MM)

title: Cambridge Audio CXA81 Integrated Amplifier
description: A high-performance integrated amplifier designed for pure audio fidelity. With 80W per channel, a high-quality ESS Sabre DAC, and a focus on clean power, the CXA81 delivers an assertive, detailed, and engaging sound. Excellent for modern digital sources and balanced connections.
details: Built-in ESS Sabre ES9016 K2M DAC
Digital Inputs: 1 Coaxial, 2 Optical, 1 USB Audio B

title: Rotel A11 MKII Integrated Amplifier
description: A refined integrated amplifier that combines classic analog performance with modern digital connectivity. It features 50W per channel, a high-quality Texas Instruments DAC, and includes a dedicated Moving Magnet phono stage and Bluetooth with aptX-HD, offering excellent value and versatility.

title: Boss DS-1 Distortion Pedal
description: The iconic orange distortion pedal, a staple since 1978. It delivers a hard-clipping, aggressive edge, perfect for rock, grunge, and metal, but versatile enough for a subtle crunch. Features Tone, Level, and Distortion controls in a robust, road-ready housing. It's Boss's best-selling 'drive' pedal of all time, known for its clear, yet biting tone.
details: Excellent choice for rock, grunge, and metal

title: Ibanez TS9 Tube Screamer Overdrive Pedal
description: The legendary green overdrive pedal. The TS9 is famous for its warm, mid-humped tone that pushes tube amps into sweet overdrive without sacrificing clarity. An industry standard for blues, rock, and fusion players, it features Drive, Tone, and Level controls. It's the quintessential 'clean boost' to tighten up your sound and make solos cut through.
details: Used as a standalone overdrive or a clean boost
Authentic reissue of the classic TS9 circuit
Essential for blues, rock, and fusion

title: MXR M169 Carbon Copy Analog Delay
description: An all-analog delay pedal celebrated for its warm, organic, and dark echoes. It offers up to 600ms of classic bucket-brigade delay time. Simple controls for Mix, Regen, and Delay, plus a MOD switch for chorus/vibrato textures. A compact, versatile, and enduring favorite among guitarists seeking a vintage, tape-like delay sound.
details: Simple, intuitive Mix, Regen, and Delay controls
Warm, dark, and vintage echo sounds

title: Dunlop GCB95 Cry Baby Wah Pedal
description: The most famous wah pedal of all time, defining classic wah tones across countless records. The GCB95 is rugged, reliable, and features a heavy-duty pot for smooth, dynamic tonal sweeping. Its instantly recognizable 'wah-wah' effect is controlled by the foot treadle, making it essential for funk, rock solos, and expressive playing.
details: Smooth control for dynamic tone sweeping
Original design used by rock legends
Essential for funk, classic rock, and blues

title: Electro-Harmonix Big Muff Pi Fuzz
description: A legendary fuzz/distortion pedal known for its enormous, violin-like sustain and thick, creamy tone. It’s been a cornerstone of alternative rock and psychedelic music for decades. Simple Volume, Tone, and Sustain controls allow you to dial in everything from singing leads to massive, wall-of-sound rhythm tones. A true giant in the fuzz world.
details: Definitive sound of psychedelic and alternative rock

title: Boss RV-6 Digital Reverb Pedal
description: A compact pedal offering a wide palette of studio-grade reverb sounds, from subtle room ambience to lush, sprawling hall and modern shimmer effects. The RV-6 features a sophisticated algorithm engine, delivering beautiful, deep, and rich reverberation that complements any style. It’s a versatile and reliable modern classic.
details: Time, Tone, and Effect Level controls

title: MXR Phase 90 Phaser Pedal
description: The quintessential phaser pedal, instantly recognizable for its rich, swirling, and warm modulation. Its one-knob simplicity (Speed control) makes it incredibly easy to use, delivering everything from a slow, subtle sweep to a fast, psychedelic swirl. Famous for shaping the sound of classic rock and hard rock solos.
details: Perfect for classic rock and psychedelic tones

title: Pro Co RAT 2 Distortion Pedal
description: A versatile distortion/fuzz pedal beloved for its ability to go from a subtle, gritty overdrive to a full-on, aggressive distortion and thick, fuzz-like saturation. The RAT is a cornerstone of alternative rock, punk, and metal. Filter, Distortion, and Volume controls allow for a massive range of tones in an indestructible steel enclosure.
details: Wide gain range from overdrive to fuzz
Unique Filter control for tone shaping
Essential for grunge, punk, and hard rock

title: Boss TU-3 Chromatic Tuner Pedal
description: The world-standard chromatic tuner, known for its accuracy, reliability, and use as a power supply for other pedals. The high-brightness LED meter is easily visible on any stage, and the stompbox mutes the signal for silent tuning. An absolute essential for every pedalboard for its tuning function and clean signal pass-through.
details: High-brightness LED meter for any stage
Can supply power to up to 7 other pedals

title: TC Electronic Ditto Looper
description: The looper that set the standard for simplicity and tone. The Ditto offers five minutes of looping time, unlimited overdubs, and 24-bit uncompressed audio quality. Its single-footswitch design is incredibly intuitive for recording, playing back, and layering loops, making it perfect for practice, songwriting, and live performance.

title: Ableton Live 12 Suite
description: A comprehensive Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) beloved by electronic and live performance artists. Features clip-launching for spontaneous creation, powerful time-stretching, and a massive library of instruments and effects. Perfect for studio production, remixing, and on-stage improvisation.
details: Session and Arrangement Views for non-linear creation
Advanced MIDI Transformations and Generative Tools
Max for Live integration for custom instruments and effects

title: FL Studio 21 Producer Edition
description: A powerful, pattern-based DAW widely popular for beat-making, hip-hop, and EDM production. Known for its legendary Piano Roll, intuitive workflow, and signature 'lifetime free updates' policy. Includes a core suite of virtual instruments and mixing tools.
details: Full MIDI controller support and performance mode
Includes 80+ software instruments and effect plugins
Supports VST, VST3, and AU plugin standards

title: Avid Pro Tools Studio
description: The industry-standard DAW for professional recording studios, mixing, and post-production. Offers unparalleled audio editing precision, robust hardware integration, and a trusted workflow for large-scale, complex projects in music and film.
details: Advanced mixing with Dolby Atmos support
Professional audio metering and gain reduction
Elastic Audio and Beat Detective for precise timing edits
Includes a collection of AAX Native plugins

title: Logic Pro for Mac
description: Apple's powerful, all-in-one digital audio workstation for macOS users. It provides professional-grade tools for composition, recording, editing, and mixing, including a massive sound library and top-tier software instruments at an affordable price point.
details: Live Loops and Step Sequencer for creative beat-making
Massive built-in library of sounds and instruments
Full Dolby Atmos Spatial Audio support

title: PreSonus Studio One 6 Pro
description: A modern, streamlined DAW known for its excellent sound quality and intuitive drag-and-drop workflow. It combines the recording/mixing environment with project mastering, making it a true all-in-one solution for musicians and producers.
details: Advanced Chord Track for easy key changes
Built-in show page for live performance

title: Xfer Records Serum
description: A highly popular wavetable synthesizer VST plugin known for its stunning visual feedback and deep sound design capabilities. It allows users to create, import, and manipulate wavetables, making it a go-to for modern electronic soundscapes.
details: Built-in wavetable editor for custom sounds
Includes a wide range of powerful filters

title: Spectrasonics Omnisphere 2.8
description: Spectrasonics' flagship software synth, an 'epic' instrument that blends over 65GB of sounds with four layers of powerful synthesis. It's a sonic powerhouse for film scoring, sound design, and music production across all genres.
details: Powerful Granular and Wavetable synthesis engines
Deep sound design and modulation possibilities
Audio Import feature to use your own sounds
Includes hundreds of complex DSP waveforms

title: Arturia Pigments 5
description: A cutting-edge software synthesizer combining multiple synthesis types—Wavetable, Virtual Analog, Sample, and Granular. Known for its vibrant, color-coded interface and a powerful, easy-to-use modulation engine, perfect for modern sound design.
details: Four independent synthesis engines (VA, WT, Sample, Granular)
Dual filter stage with 50+ filter types

title: Cockos REAPER 7
description: An extremely affordable, yet full-featured Digital Audio Workstation known for its small footprint, exceptional stability, and unparalleled customization. It's an excellent choice for budget-conscious professionals and hobbyists who need a powerful tool.
details: Fast, stable, and tiny installation size
Supports nearly all audio formats and plugins (VST, AU, etc.)
Extensive audio routing and multi-channel support

title: Native Instruments Kontakt 7
description: The industry-leading sampler and instrument platform. It hosts thousands of third-party virtual instruments and is essential for film scoring, sound design, and professional music production utilizing realistic orchestral and synth libraries.
details: Deep sound editing and creation tools
7 built-in VST effects and 9 bus effects
New hi-res library browser and interface

title: Steinberg Dorico Pro 5
description: A professional music notation and scoring software designed by former Sibelius developers. Known for its sophisticated engraving quality, intelligent musical logic, and fast, flexible workflow for composers and publishers.
details: Unparalleled engraving quality for printed scores
Support for complex notation and open scoring
VST Expression Maps for realistic playback
New features for composition and performance

title: iZotope Ozone 11 Advanced
description: A complete mastering suite that utilizes machine learning to deliver a polished, release-ready master. It includes a comprehensive collection of equalizers, dynamics processors, stereo imagers, and a powerful Master Assistant.
details: AI-powered Master Assistant for quick starts
Comprehensive suite of mastering tools (EQ, Dynamics, etc.)
Tonal Balance Control for genre-specific adjustments
Low-End Focus module for bass clarity

title: The Mixing Engineer's Handbook, 5th Edition
description: A comprehensive guide to the art and science of audio mixing by industry veteran Bobby Owsinski. Covers everything from mix preparation and EQ to dynamics, effects, and mastering essentials. Features interviews and tips from top professional mixing engineers.

title: Mastering Audio: The Art and The Science, 3rd Edition
description: The definitive, in-depth reference for audio mastering by Bob Katz, a Grammy-winning engineer. This book explores the technical, aesthetic, and psychoacoustical principles behind creating a world-class master recording, suitable for all media formats.
details: Topics: Loudness standards, DSD, vinyl, miking

title: Writing Better Lyrics: The Essential Guide to Lyric Writing
description: A classic and highly practical book on the craft of lyric writing by Berklee professor Pat Pattison. It offers techniques for using sense-bound imagery, managing repetition, and avoiding clichés to create emotionally impactful and professional-grade song lyrics.

title: How Music Works
description: An eclectic, thought-provoking exploration of music's creation, performance, distribution, and consumption by Talking Heads founder David Byrne. From the impact of venue acoustics on composition to the evolution of technology and the music business.

title: Music Theory for Computer Musicians
description: Tailored specifically for producers and electronic musicians, this book breaks down essential music theory concepts—scales, chords, harmony, and rhythm—with a focus on their practical application in a modern DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) environment.

title: Just Kids
description: Patti Smith's acclaimed memoir documenting her profound relationship with photographer Robert Mapplethorpe in 1960s and 70s New York. A beautiful and moving account of youth, art, poverty, and the forging of a legendary artistic identity.
details: Award: National Book Award for Nonfiction
Setting: New York art and music scene, 1960s/70s

title: The Creative Act: A Way of Being
description: From legendary music producer Rick Rubin, this is a deep meditation on the nature of creativity itself. It offers philosophical wisdom and practical guidance for anyone seeking to unlock their artistic potential and live a more creative life, regardless of medium.

title: All You Need to Know About the Music Business (11th Ed.)
description: The 'industry bible' by Donald S. Passman, covering the complex and ever-changing legal and financial aspects of the music world. Essential reading for artists, managers, producers, and anyone navigating royalties, contracts, publishing, and the impact of streaming.

title: Pink Floyd 'Dark Side' Graphic Tee
description: A classic-fit cotton t-shirt featuring the iconic prism artwork from Pink Floyd's 'The Dark Side of the Moon' album. A must-have for any classic rock fan. Available in sizes S-XXL.

title: Nirvana 'Smiley Face' Graphic Hoodie
description: Heavyweight black pull-over hoodie with the famous Nirvana 'Smiley Face' logo on the chest and back. Essential rock merch for cooler weather.

title: Rolling Stones Classic Tongue Coffee Mug
description: Start your day with rock 'n' roll. This 11oz ceramic mug features the universally recognized Rolling Stones 'Hot Lips' logo. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

title: Led Zeppelin 'Swan Song' Embroidered Patch
description: High-quality embroidered patch featuring Led Zeppelin's iconic 'Swan Song' logo (Icarus). Perfect for customizing jackets, bags, or denim vests. Iron-on backing.

title: The Beatles 'Abbey Road' Album Cover Poster
description: A full-color poster featuring the timeless album cover of The Beatles' 'Abbey Road'. A perfect piece of decor for music lovers and collectors. Standard poster size.

title: Premium Vinyl Record Cleaning Kit
description: A complete 4-in-1 kit for superior vinyl maintenance. Includes an antistatic velvet brush, cleaning liquid, stylus brush, and storage pouch to protect your cherished record collection.

title: Make Your Own Guitar Pick Punch
description: Punch out custom guitar picks from old credit cards, plastic sheets, or any thin plastic material. A fun and eco-friendly gift for any guitar player.

title: Metallica 'Master of Puppets' Album Hoodie
description: Black, warm fleece hoodie featuring the iconic album art from Metallica's 'Master of Puppets'. Perfect for metal fans looking to stay warm.

title: Treble Clef Metal Keychain
description: A durable, polished metal keychain shaped like a classic treble clef. A simple, elegant accessory for musicians, music students, or music lovers.

title: Wooden LP Dividers (A-Z) for Vinyl Storage
description: Keep your record collection neatly organized. Set of 26 wooden dividers with engraved A-Z labels for quick and easy browsing of your LPs.

title: AC/DC 'Back In Black' Tour Graphic Tee
description: Vintage-style concert tee commemorating the iconic 'Back In Black' tour. Features distressed print for a worn-in, classic rock look.

title: Misunderstood Song Lyrics Coasters (Set of 4)
description: A fun set of four ceramic coasters featuring hilariously misheard song lyrics from classic songs. Protect your furniture with a musical laugh!

title: Grateful Dead Dancing Bear Enamel Pin
description: A colorful enamel lapel pin featuring one of the famous Grateful Dead Dancing Bears. Perfect for adding a touch of color to your jacket or backpack.

title: Classic Guitar Pattern Socks
description: Soft and comfortable crew socks featuring a repeated pattern of vintage electric guitars. A subtle way to show off your passion for music. One size fits most adults.

title: Radiohead 'Scribble' Wall Poster
description: Modern art poster featuring the iconic 'Scribble' design often associated with Radiohead's unique aesthetic. Great for fans of alternative and experimental rock.
details: Suitable for Dorms or Home Office
